---
config:
  radar:
    axisScaleFactor: 0.25
    curveTension: 0.1
  theme: base
  themeVariables:
    cScale0: "#FF0000"
    cScale1: "#00FF00"
    cScale2: "#0000FF"
    radar:
      curveOpacity: 0
---
radar-beta
  axis A, B, C, D, E
  curve c1{1,2,3,4,5}
  curve c2{5,4,3,2,1}
  curve c3{3,3,3,3,3}
---
